commandDescription: Add stuff to your permission sets
permissionSetDescription: Comma seperated list of Permission Set Developer names
justBranchDescription: Just add the files that are different between this git branch and master
permsetpathDescription: The path to your permissionset directory.
objectPathDescription: The path to your object metadata.
errorCheckoutABranch: Branch was specified (--justbranch or -j) so checkout a branch (other than '%s')
